Token.Abstract: The RKObjectPaginatorDelegate formal protocol defines RKObjectPaginator delegate methods that can be implemented by objects to receive informational callbacks about paginated loading of mapping objects through RestKit.
Tells the delegate the paginator has loaded a page of objects from the collection.

Parameter.Name: paginator
Parameter.Abstract: The paginator that loaded the objects.

Parameter.Name: objects
Parameter.Abstract: An array of objects mapped from the remote JSON/XML representation.

Parameter.Name: page
Parameter.Abstract: The page number that was loaded.

Token.Abstract: Tells the delegate the paginator has failed loading due to an error.

Parameter.Name: paginator
Parameter.Abstract: The paginator that failed loading due to an error.

Parameter.Name: error
Parameter.Abstract: An NSError indicating the cause of the failure.

Parameter.Name: loader
Parameter.Abstract: The loader request that resulted in the failure.

Token.Abstract: Tells the delegate that the paginator is about to begin loading a page of objects.

Parameter.Name: page
Parameter.Abstract: The numeric page number being loaded.

Parameter.Name: loader
Parameter.Abstract: The object loader request used to load the page.

Token.Abstract: Tells the delegate the paginator has loaded the first page of objects in the collection.

Parameter.Name: paginator
Parameter.Abstract: The paginator instance that has loaded the first page.

Token.Abstract: Tells the delegate the paginator has loaded the last page of objects in the collection.

Parameter.Name: paginator
Parameter.Abstract: The paginator instance that has loaded the last page.
